value: Breeds in New Zealand: North Island, South Island, Little and Great Barrier Islands, Kapiti Island, Stewart Island, Chatham Islands. Win- ters chiefly in the Society, Samoa, Tonga and Fiji Islands; recorded from the Palau, Caroline, Marshall, Gilbert, Cook and Marquesas Islands. On migration recorded from New Caledonia, Erromanga, Kermadec Islands, Norfolk and Lord Howe Islands; occasional on the Solomon Islands (Savo, Malaita); accidental in the Bismarck Archipelago (Vuatom, Nissan).
refer: Peter's Checklist of the Birds of the World

value: NCal, PNG, Sol, Van, Grande Terre, Anusagaru, Bougainville, Buka, Carteret, Duke of York, New Britain, Ninigo, Nissan, Vuatom, Banika, Buena Vista, Choiseul, Fauro, Fenualoa, Gizo, Gower, Guadalcanal, Kohinggo, Lomlom, Makira, Malaita, Nepani, Oema, Ontong Java, Ramos, Ranongga, Rendova, Russell Grp, Santa Isabel, Savo, Shortlands, Sikaiana, Simbo, Tetipari, Tinakula, Three Sisters, Tiara, Tucopia, Ugi, Ulawa, Ambrym, Aniwa, Efate
New Zealand; winters to Polynesia and Bismarck Archipelago

forest;in mountainous areas more often on vegetated ridges than valleys;usu.in.dense native forests, of Nothofagus, broadleaf spp.or podocarps;often in pines or other exotics;sometimes scrub, parks, gardens

subcat_descr: Bill length (sex unknown) - Nares to tip

value: ground displays only, including displays on trees and bushes
